description: When I create an instance via the OSAPI, the successful response returns with a 200, as opposed to a 202 as the spec says it should.
title: OSAPI 1.1: Create server instance response code does not match spec

comments.content: When I create an instance via the OSAPI, the successful response returns with a 200, as opposed to a 202 as the spec says it should.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dwalleck

comments.content: I accidentally re-filed this and fixed it. I'll mark the second bug as duplicate of this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
